headline: Northrop Grumman Board Refresh Sparks Questions On Governance And Valuation
summary: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) has appointed Admiral Christopher W. Grady, former vice chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, to its Board of Directors. James S. Turley has been named Lead Independent Director, with the change scheduled to take effect later this year. The company is also expanding the size of its board as part of its ongoing corporate governance adjustments. Northrop Grumman, a major U.S. defense contractor, is involved in long term programs in areas such as aerospace, missile...
